name: Aerospace and Defense
description: Manufacturers and suppliers of aircraft, spacecraft, and defense systems, as well as providers of related services and technologies.

name: Art and Antiques
description: Dealers, auction houses, and collectors of fine art, antiques, and rare collectibles, including paintings, sculptures, and historical artifacts.

name: Charitable Organizations
description: Non-profit organizations focused on philanthropy, social welfare, and community development, including foundations, trusts, and advocacy groups.

name: Civic and Social Organizations
description: Membership-based organizations focused on community engagement, social activities, and civic improvement, including clubs, associations, and volunteer groups.

name: Environmental Organizations
description: Non-profit organizations focused on conservation, sustainability, and environmental advocacy, including wildlife preservation and eco-friendly initiatives.

name: Funeral and Cemetery Services
description: Providers of funeral, burial, and cremation services, as well as cemetery management and memorial products.

name: Government Agencies
description: Federal, state, and local government entities responsible for public policy, administration, and service delivery, including law enforcement and public health agencies.

name: Libraries and Archives
description: Institutions responsible for collecting, preserving, and providing access to books, documents, and other knowledge resources, including public and private libraries.

name: Museums and Galleries
description: Institutions dedicated to the collection, preservation, and exhibition of artistic, historical, and scientific artifacts, including art museums and science centers.

name: Non-Profit Organizations
description: Charitable, educational, and advocacy organizations focused on social causes, community development, and public benefit, excluding government agencies and civic organizations.

name: Political Organizations
description: Parties, campaigns, and advocacy groups focused on political activism, lobbying, and policy influence, including political action committees and special interest groups.

name: Religious Organizations
description: Institutions and groups focused on religious worship, education, and community service, including churches, synagogues, mosques, and other places of worship.

name: Social Advocacy Organizations
description: Non-profit organizations focused on promoting social justice, human rights, and community empowerment, including advocacy groups and social movements.

name: Trade Associations and Unions
description: Industry-specific organizations focused on promoting trade, commerce, and labor rights, including professional associations and labor unions.
